CustomField.description: We have two quotes: 1) Offer quote - what we want the customer to sign. 2) Auto-Renewal quote - what will be the default pricing if the customer doesn't sign. This field stores a reference to the AR Quote.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Auto-Renewal Quote will be used if customer doesn't sign the primary quote and includes AR pricing. If we go to auto-renewal this quote will replace the Primary Quote.
CustomField.label: AR Quote
